statements: SELECT * FROM Energy_Storage;
SELECT id, storage_capacity FROM Energy_Storage WHERE device_id = 5;
SELECT regulatory_standard, installation_date FROM Energy_Storage WHERE storage_capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Energy_Storage ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT device_id, storage_capacity, regulatory_standard FROM Energy_Storage WHERE regulatory_standard = 'ISO 9001' ORDER BY storage_capacity DESC;
SELECT id, device_id, storage_capacity, installation_date FROM Energy_Storage WHERE regulatory_standard = 'CE' ORDER BY installation_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT device_id, regulatory_standard FROM Energy_Storage WHERE storage_capacity > 10000 ORDER BY storage_capacity DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM Energy_Storage WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT id, regulatory_standard FROM Energy_Storage WHERE device_id IN (101, 102, 103)
SELECT id, installation_date FROM Energy_Storage WHERE storage_capacity < 5000 ORDER BY storage_capacity ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_facility;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name FROM energy_storage_facility WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM energy_storage_facility ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_standards WHERE year_issued > 2010;
SELECT standard_id, standard_name, year_issued FROM regulatory_standards ORDER BY year_issued ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_standards WHERE year_issued = 2020
SELECT facility_id, facility_name FROM energy_storage_facility WHERE location = 'California'
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM energy_storage_facility ORDER BY facility_name ASC
SELECT * FROM regulatory_standards WHERE standard_name LIKE '%environment%'
SELECT standard_id, standard_name, year_issued FROM regulatory_standards WHERE year_issued < 2015
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_products;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM energy_storage_products ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_sites WHERE location='California';
SELECT site_name, capacity FROM energy_storage_sites WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT agency_name, regulations FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE headquarters_location='Washington DC';
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_products WHERE regulatory_compliance = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM energy_storage_products WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM energy_storage_products ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_sites WHERE location = 'California' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT site_name, location, capacity FROM energy_storage_sites WHERE regulatory_certification LIKE '%ISO%'
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_providers;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM energy_storage_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT agency_name, location FROM regulatory_agencies WHERE location='California';
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM storage_facilities WHERE capacity > 5000;
SELECT report_id, report_date, compliance_status FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_storage_providers;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM energy_storage_providers WHERE location='California';
SELECT regulatory_agencies.agency_name, compliance_reports.report_date FROM regulatory_agencies INNER JOIN compliance_reports ON regulatory_agencies.agency_id = compliance_reports.agency_id;
SELECT facility_name, capacity FROM storage_facilities ORDER BY capacity DESC;

SELECT facility_name, location, compliance_status FROM storage_facilities INNER JOIN compliance_reports ON storage_facilities.facility_id = compliance_reports.facility_id WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM EnergySuppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, country FROM EnergySuppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT consumer_name, category FROM EnergyConsumers WHERE location = 'City A';
SELECT facility_name, capacity, location FROM EnergyStorageFacilities WHERE capacity > 5000;
SELECT * FROM EnergySuppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, country FROM EnergySuppliers ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM EnergyStorageFacilities;

SELECT EnergyConsumers.consumer_name, EnergyUsageLogs.usage_date, EnergyUsageLogs.consumption FROM EnergyConsumers JOIN EnergyUsageLogs ON EnergyConsumers.consumer_id = EnergyUsageLogs.consumer_id WHERE EnergyUsageLogs.consumption > 100;
SELECT * FROM EnergySuppliers WHERE country = 'USA';
